name: SwallowScreenTimeCS

concept.definition: Screening performed within 4 hours of symptom onset.
Screening performed within 24 hours of symptom onset (but after 4h).
Screening performed after 24 hours of symptom onset.
Screening performed but timing relative to symptom onset unknown.

title: Swallowing Screening Timing Category Code System
description: Temporal categories relative to stroke onset for swallowing screening.
